verses.name: 1 Chronicles 27:1
verses.text: Now the children of Israel after their number, to wit, the chief fathers and captains of thousands and hundreds, and their officers that served the king in any matter of the courses, which came in and went out month by month throughout all the months of the year, of every course were twenty and four thousand.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 27:2
verses.text: Over the first course for the first month was Jashobeam the son of Zabdiel: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 27:3
verses.text: Of the children of Perez was the chief of all the captains of the host for the first month.
